programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Which Way Now/Thomas and the Shooting Star
programme.desc: Rusty has two jobs and a shooting star is due to light up the night sky of Sodor.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Edward Strikes Out/Topped Off Thomas
programme.desc: A new crane, Rocky, comes to Sodor and Thomas challenges Spencer to a race.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Wharf and Peace/Thomas’ Frosty Friend
programme.desc: Skarloey doesn’t like the Wharf and Thomas collects timber for Farmer McColl’s roof.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Emily and the Special Cars/Thomas and the Colors
programme.desc: Gordon sets a record and James pulls the carriages for the Sodor School football match.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Birthday Mail
programme.desc: Thomas delivers birthday mail to Alice and James brings coal to the wharf.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Missing Cars/Thomas and the Treasure
programme.desc: Skarloey has lots of jobs and Thomas takes an Admiral to open a new maritime museum.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Tuba/Peace and Quiet/Percy’s New Whistle
programme.desc: Thomas collects a brass band, Murdoch wants quiet and Percy causes havoc with his whistle.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas to the Rescue/Emily’s New Coaches/Henry and the Wishing Tree
programme.desc: Thomas worries about steam engines, Emily arrives in Sodor and Henry wants a job change.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: James Gets a New Coat/Best Dressed Engine/Thomas Saves the Day
programme.desc: James gets a new coat of paint, the engines enter a competition and Thomas receives help.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Percy’s Big Mistake/Gordon and Spencer/Thomas, Emily and the Snowplough
programme.desc: Percy runs away, Spencer comes to the island and Thomas gets snowed in.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Don’t Tell Thomas/James and the Queen of Sodor/Emily’s New Route
programme.desc: The engines keep a secret, James collects the Queen of Sodor and Emily gets a new route.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Fireworks/Bill, Ben and Fergus/Gordon Takes Charge
programme.desc: Thomas and James collect fireworks, Fergus works in the quarry and Gordon helps Percy.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Spic and Span/Not so Hasty Puddings/Edward the Great
programme.desc: Thomas and Percy compete, Elizabeth collects Christmas puddings and Edward races Spencer.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Squeak, Rattle and Roll/Percy Gets It Right/Thomas and the Circus
programme.desc: Gordon develops a squeak, Percy’s track is wobbly and Thomas collects the circus.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas Gets it Right/What’s the Matter with Henry/As Good as Gordon
programme.desc: Thomas transports eggs, Henry doesn’t feel well and Emily pulls Gordon’s express.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Fish/The Old Iron Bridge/Emily’s Adventure
programme.desc: Thomas has to move stinky fish, Skarloey is given a fright and Emily has an urgent job.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Halloween/Trusty Rusty/You Can Do It, Toby!
programme.desc: Thomas and Emily are spooked on Halloween, Duncan doesn’t listen and Toby saves Gordon.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: James Goes Too Far/Three Cheers for Thomas/Chickens to School
programme.desc: James gets an important job, Thomas wants a medal and Thomas takes three specials.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Too Hot for Thomas/Salty’s Stormy Tale/Percy and the Magic Carpet
programme.desc: Thomas misses out on a trip, Salty gets teased and Percy’s carpet starts to fly.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas’ Milkshake Muddle/Spotless Record/Mighty Mac
programme.desc: Thomas has two jobs, Arthur is put to work and an unusual new engine arrives on Sodor.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Molly’s Special Special/Edward the Really Useful Engine/Respect for Gordo
programme.desc: Molly arrives, the big engines think Edward is old and Gordon’s firebox develops a rattle.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Birthday Picnic/Harold and the Flying Horse/Tuneful Toots
programme.desc: Thomas helps with a picnic, Harold feels left out and Rusty’s two-tone horn is tuneful.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Toy Shop/Something Fishy/Rheneas and the Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new toy shop opens, Arthur wants a new route and Mr. Percival needs two careful engines.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the New Engine/Bulgy Rides Again/Toby Feels Left Out
programme.desc: Neville arrives in Sodor, Bulgy the Bus carries passengers and the Sodor Museum opens.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas Tries His Best/No Sleep for Cranky/The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: The carnival comes to Sodor, Cranky is in no mood for a story and Rusty tells a story.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Statue/Toby’s Windmill/Henry and the Flagpole
programme.desc: A special statue is delivered, Toby’s windmill is damaged and Henry collects a flagpole.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Emily Knows Best/Gordon Takes a Tumble/Thomas’ Day Off
programme.desc: Emily decides to be queen for a day, Gordon is proud and Dennis delivers roof tiles.

programme.sub-title: Spic and Span/Not so Hasty Puddings/Edward the Great
programme.desc: Thomas and Percy compete, Elizabeth collects Christmas puddings and Edward races Spencer.
